meanings.definition: The quality or state of being large in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The largeness of the elephant amazed the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The largeness of the ocean made it impossible to see the other side.
meanings.sent3: The largeness of the ice cream scoop made the kids' eyes widen in delight.
meanings.sent4: The largeness of the mountain cast a shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The largeness of the tree trunk made it seem like a giant's leg.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being generous or magnanimous.
meanings.sent1: Her largeness in sharing her toys with others made her a favorite among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The largeness of his heart was evident in the way he helped those in need.
meanings.sent3: The largeness of the cake slices she gave out surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: His largeness in forgiving others inspired those around him.
meanings.sent5: The largeness of her spirit shone through in every kind gesture she made.
